subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Steve Sullivan scored the tying goal in the third period, and James Neal and Evgeni Malkin connected in the first two rounds of a shootout to lift the host Pittsburgh Penguins to their eighth straight victory.
snippet: Steve Sullivan scored the tying goal in the third period, and James Neal and Evgeni Malkin connected in the first two rounds of a shootout to lift the host Pittsburgh Penguins to their eighth straight victory.
